scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 X-DolbyVoice-Client-LogId: sipp_client_0 Subject: Performance Test Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, OPTIONS, PRACK, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, UPDATE, REGISTER, INFO Require: timer Supported: timer, 100rel Session-Expires: 3600;refresher=uac Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

ACK sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0

INFO sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Accept: application/sdp, text/*, application/msml+xml, application/moml+xml Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, OPTIONS, PRACK, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, UPDATE, REGISTER, INFO Supported: timer, 100rel Content-Type: application/msml+xml Content-Length: [len]
<msml version="1.1"> <createconference name="conf_0"> <audiomix> <asn ri="3s" /> <n-loudest n="4" /> </audiomix> </createconference> <join id1="conn:[$client_sip_id]" id2="conf:conf_0"> <stream dir="to-id1" media="audio" dlb:echo_suppression="disable"> <clamp dtmf="false" /> <gain amt="0" /> </stream> </join> </msml>

nop.display: name recording for 3s and wait until recording finish:

scenario.send:
INFO sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Accept: application/sdp, text/*, application/msml+xml, application/moml+xml Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, OPTIONS, PRACK, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, UPDATE, REGISTER, INFO Supported: timer, 100rel Content-Type: application/msml+xml Content-Length: [len]
<msml version="1.1"> <dialogstart target="conn:[$client_sip_id]" type="application/moml+xml" name="recordname"> <record dest="file://transient/placeholder.wav" format="audio/dvcr" maxtime="3s" prespeech="5s" postspeech="2s" termkey="#"> <recordexit> <exit namelist="record.len" /> </recordexit> </record> </dialogstart> </msml>
SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Content-Type: application/msml+xml Content-Length: [len]

nop.display: playback name recording and wait until playback finish:

scenario.send:
INFO sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Accept: application/sdp, text/*, application/msml+xml, application/moml+xml Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, OPTIONS, PRACK, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, UPDATE, REGISTER, INFO Supported: timer, 100rel Content-Type: application/msml+xml Content-Length: [len]
<msml version="1.1"> <dialogstart target="conf:conf_0" type="application/moml+xml" name="name_playback"> <play barge="false" cleardb="true"> <audio uri="file://transient/placeholder.wav"/> <audio uri="file://provisioned/bt/MM2/eng/post_name_entry.wav"/> <playexit> <exit namelist="play.end" /> </playexit> </play> </dialogstart> </msml>
SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Content-Type: application/msml+xml Content-Length: [len]

BYE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0
